products.title: Volume Lash Extensions
products.description: Volume says it all. This will make your own lashes look fuller and are light weight, from a 2D to 7D in variety. This is an advanced technique to fan every lash to make your lashes appear fuller.

products.title: Local Craft Beer Mixed Offer
products.description: A 24 bottle tasting journey of some of SA's hottest craft beers around town. Not for sale to persons under the age of 18.
terms_and_conditions: Not for sale to persons under the age of 18.

products.title: Goede Hoop Magnum Pinotage 2002
products.description: A perfect gift for Xmas this season of an exclusive older vintage Pinotage from an award winning Stellenbosch estate.
terms_and_conditions: Not for sale to persons under the age of 18.

products.title: Individual Eyelash Extensions
products.description: Getting individual eyelash extensions are when you attach a lash to each and every natural lash to extend the look of natural lashes to a longer fuller look.
